entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:28 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:28 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:28 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
